# tsuga_retention_policy (Resource)

Data retention rule for a data source within an environment


## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "tsuga_retention_policy" "retention_policy" {
  env           = "prod"
  team_id       = "123-abc-456"
  data_source   = "logs"
  duration_days = "30-days"
  is_enabled    = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `data_source` (String)
- `duration_days` (String)
- `is_enabled` (Boolean)

### Optional

- `env` (String)
- `team_id` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
